title: Samsung One UI: What about the software?
description: Samsung will unveil it's Galaxy S10 lineup tomorrow, running the new One UI software. One UI is built on top of Android Pie and is cleaner and easier to use. In this week's Processor, Dieter dives into the perks and drawbacks of One UI.
